field_text_formatted.value:
Create a Micro-content type:

  1. Navigate to the "Add micro-content type" page in Drupal: /admin/structure/microcontent-types/add
  2. I used the following values:
    • Label: Form: Image upload
    • Machine name: form_image_upload
    • Description: An example Decoupled form with an image upload field.
  3. Add fields: /admin/structure/microcontent-types/manage/form_image_upload/fields/add-field
    • Label: Image
    • Machine name: field_image
    • Type: Image field
  4. Configure permissions for the Micro-content type: /admin/people/permissions/module/microcontent

    In my case, I want to allow anonymous users the ability to create the content, but not edit it.
